detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#4)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#6)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#14-22)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#23-32)
	- Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#7)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#8)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#36-40)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#9)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#41-43)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- Bitdex.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#71-76)

ownerWithdrawETH() should be declared external:
	- Bitdex.ownerWithdrawETH() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#98-107)

setTokenPerETH(uint256) should be declared external:
	- Bitdex.setTokenPerETH(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitdex.sol#108-116)
